name: John Doe and Derek the Ghost - GGJ 2021
name_original: John Doe and Derek the Ghost - GGJ 2021
description:
+++ Introduction

John Doe is lost. He is trapped in a mansion and can't find the way out. As the friendly ghost, Derek tries to support him as best as possible. Help John Doe to find the hints so can reach the door to enter the next room. But be careful, John is afraid of ghosts, make sure he doesn't see you.

+++ Controls

Use point and click to move the ghost. Take possession of items with right click.

+++ Credits

Game was created by Yashar Kiani and Marco Behnke.

+++ Global Game Jam

Link: https://globalgamejam.org/2021/games/wip-john-doe-and-ghost-7
